title: Ep. 57: 'Mr. Robot' Premiere and 'Vice Principals' Re-up
description:
The Ringer's Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald gear up for the return of 'Mr. Robot' and break down what's next for Elliot in Season 2. Then, they discuss the premiere of the HBO comedy miniseries 'Vice Principals' and the importance of comfort television. 

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
